directions: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook and stir garlic in hot oil until sizzling, about 30 seconds. Add kale and 2 tablespoons water to garlic, cover the saucepan with a lid, and cook until kale softens, 2 to 3 minutes.
Stir oats, red pepper flakes, and salt into kale mixture; pour in enough water to cover oats. Cook and stir oats until desired consistency is reached, about 3 minutes.
ingredients: 2 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
2 leaves kale, stems discarded and leaves chopped, or more to taste
2 tablespoons water, or more as needed
1 pinch red pepper flakes, or more to taste
title: Spicy Oatmeal and Kale
